title: DevFest Paris 2016 announced
brief: GDG Paris is proud to announce this new edition of DevFest Paris - the largest Google related event in Paris. So book the date.

title: Call for Papers
brief: The Call for Papers is now open. Do you want to be a speaker ? Don't forget to submit your proposal before December 15th, 2015.

title: Book your ticket
brief: As of today, you can book your ticket for DevFest Paris 2016. Hurry up : we have special price for early birds!
